results.title: 50th Birthday Gift for Her,50 and Fabulous, 50th Birthday Girl, 50th Birthday Gift, Fiftieth Birthday, Live Laugh Love, Friend Gift
results.description:
50th Birthday Gift for Her,50 and Fabulous, 50th Birthday Girl, 50th Birthday Gift, Fiftieth Birthday, Live Laugh Love, Friend Gift

This Charm Bracelet is the perfect for your Best Friend or Sister... Even your Daughter who is turning 30, 40, 50, 60 or 70.

Select birthday year at checkout!

Details for bracelet:

* Byzantine Chain Bracelet
* 7/8" disc with Live Laugh Love
* 7/8" disc with 50 and fabulous ( choose your age at checkout)
* Silver Pewter Heart Charm
* ONE Pearl Charm
(OPTIONAL) Birthstone

This bracelet comes in ONLY Silver.

Custom orders are welcome.

Each bracelet is nicely wrapped in an organza bag. Unless you prefer to select our Gift Package Option During Checkout

Bracelet Comes as One Size. (approx 7 3/4")
Let us know your wrist size when you check out. We can adjust the chain link bracelet to fit a wrist a spec larger.
Let us know during check out and we can add a few links to the design.

High Quality Antique Silver Love Bracelet with Heart Clasps
Chain Length: 20 cm( 7 3/4 inches)
Chain Width: 6 mm
Color: Antiqued Silver
Material: Metal Alloy, Nickel free, Lead free

Should you have any questions please contact us through ETSY CONVO. We typically reply with in 24 hours if not sooner! We welcome special requests and custom orders. Looking forward to hearing from you.

To see our latest designs, updates and sales.

results.title: Be Thankful Live Simply Farmhouse Wood Sign
results.description:
Farmhouse style wood sign is made with solid pine. The sign pictured has dark walnut stain and white lettering. There are other options available for you to choose from in the listing photos. When choosing a background stain and lettering please insure that you choose light colors for dark stains and dark color for light stains. This sign is cute to lean against something in your home or office or to hang on the wall. Dimensions are 9.25x18.5x0.75 inches. Be thankful and live simply pretty much sums up a way of life. 

Hanging:

We have made hanging very safe and easy. Each sign will come with hardware already attached to the back of your sign. Hardware is picked based on sign weight.

Please Note:

Our items are all handmade. Our signs are made of wood, due to the character of wood, sometimes small knots or natural imperfections are present. We always hand pick the best looking pieces but also feel that slight imperfections help add to the character of our signs. The back of all framed signs sanded but unpainted.

See the other items we offer at https://www.etsy.com/shop/SCCustomImaging

Shipping and Turn Around Time:

Etsy will tell you our estimated processing time before you purchase an item. We typically ship with 3-5 business day turnaround, although this may be longer during the holiday season. Standard shipping is FREE on purchases over $35.00 in this shop.

Custom Orders:

Are you looking for a custom sign? We would love to create you a custom sign.  Just send us an Etsy conversation explaining what you are wanting and we will create it for you. Once created and approved by you I will simply create an Etsy listing with your name on it for purchase. Check out our shop policies for custom signs.

Why choose S&C Custom Imaging

We love what we do and our #1 priority is creating high quality items that help you add personality and character to your home. When you purchase from us you are helping a small business owner reach their dream.

results.title: Waterproof Live Love Laugh Sticker, Live Love Laugh MN Sticker, Plaid Live Love Laugh Sticker, Live Love Laugh Sticker, Plaid MN Sticker
results.description: These die-cut stickers can be put on anything you would like! Whether you put them on water bottles, laptops, notebooks, or phone cases they are sure to spice up your space! These stickers are printed on waterproof paper, sprayed with acrylic spray, and laminated so they are waterproof.

results.title: Smiling Ruth 1924 -  Lovely Junk Necklace - Vintage Rhinestones and  Scrabble Photo Pendant - Friendship Gift
results.description:
The young woman appearing in this 1924 photo was named 'Ruth' - her Roaring Twenties style is seen in her hat and big fur collar - very cool! 

The original 1924 photo on this unique scrabble tile pendant is clipped from an antique photo album.

- aanraku bail lends a touch of gentle silver shine.

- With the photo pendant is a piece from a vintage jewelry treasure - sparkly rhinestones - and a single silver bead.

- Suspended on a generous  30" length of brown grosgrain satin ribbon.

The Big Grin pendant would make a fabulous gift for that special friend, roommate, or wise mentor. Does someone you know need a reminder to smile and laugh? 

***This tiny piece of reframed history is water-resistant and not suitable for young children.

*** Please examine the photos as part of the item description and convo me with any questions.

Make a shirt transfer easily by printing onto iron on transfer paper that you can buy at any craft store Print your OWN Stickers or t-shirt!!! Or cut them with your cutter! You can also print it onto an iron on transfer to make a super cute shirt! Make these cute shirts for your shop, family or friends with this easy to print or cut design. This is Digital artwork ready for immediate download and ready to be use on such software as Cricut Design Space, Silhouette Studio and other cutting software.

----------------------------------------------------------

SVG, PNG, PDF, JPG, EPS, DXF other files are also available.

results.title: Handmade Wire Words "Live Love Laugh"  Set 3 Wall Mount Metal Wall Word Sculpture, Wall Decor, Wire Wall Art Bedroom Sign, Housewarming
results.description:
Size 
‘Live’ - 22 cm
‘love’ - 21 cm
‘laugh’ - 26 cm



INSTALLATION

I will send you glue to paste them on all.

I recommend hanging your wire art using clear command hooks, a great way to prevent damage to your wall (perfect for renters and those who like to change their mind). Alternatively wall nails can be used.

I also offer an option where the wire can be inserted into your wall via 3 mm drill holes. If you would like this option then please let me know in the 'notes to seller' box when purchasing. This option is free of charge and installation instructions are provided.

results.title: Faith Over Fear T-Shirt, Christian Shirt, Faith Top, Religious T Shirt, Church Tee, Grace, Joy, Sunday Best
results.description:
Welcome to Arden’s Apparel! We specialize in offering unique, custom designed t-shirts that express your passions and hobbies. Our shirts are hand-printed on only the softest, premium Bella Canvas shirts!

We are a small team with BIG hearts! We work hard to provide you quality products quickly. Your happiness is our number one priority. For all inquiries, please contact us directly on our Etsy shop. We would love to ease your mind and make your shopping experience a positive one!

We have the following valid promo codes currently. 
Please keep in mind that you can only use 1 promo code. Free shipping is only for domestic shipping. 

Discount available on bulk orders! 
••• Spend $35 and get shipping for free. Use code SPEND35 
••• Spend $100 get 10% off. Use code SPEND100GET10
••• Spend $200 get 20% off. Use code SPEND200GET20

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
“HOW TO ORDER CUSTOM T-SHIRT”
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

1.	Please, Check and Review all Photos.

2.	Select Your T-Shirt Style and Size drop down menu.

3.	Select Your Product Color from Drop-down menu.

4.	Choose Your Quantity as much as you want.

5.	You will see “Add Your Personalization” Section which is located below the quantity box. Please Specify your ''TEXT'', ''TEXT COLOR'', ''FONT NUMBER'' for your Family T-shirt. 

a.	Enter your DESIGN Color
	Example: White
b.	Text / DESIGN Color: Black

***Do NOT leave custom wording/design change requests in "Notes" or "Personalization Box." It will not be accepted unless prior approval from us. ***

6.	Your shipping will automatically combine when ordering multiples.

7.	Click ADD TO CART. And, you can go back to add more product color for your family members and text colors, or You can complete the checkout process.

8.	Please Click “Proceed to Check Out”

9.	Finally, Your Custom Shirts will be ready to ship 1-3 Business Day.

NOTE:
If there is no specification of text color and fonts, we will be using the default colors and font.
 
Default Text Color BLACK for T-Shirts:
White | Heather Light Gray | Orange
 
Default Text Color WHITE for T-shirts:
Black | Purple | Red | Heather Dark Gray | Heather Maroon | Kelly Green | Heather Green | Heather Olive | Heather Mauve

Printed and Shipped in the USA.

⬥ OPTIONAL UPGRADES: 
 
Add Text:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924403960/add-front-or-back-text-shirt-add-on-item?ref=shop_home_active_4&frs=1

Rush Order:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938446709/rush-my-order-expedite-processing-time?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

Priority Mail:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938469677/upgrade-to-priority-mail-or-express-mail?ref=shop_home_active_2&frs=1

Upgrade T-Shirt Size:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938454573/upgrade-style-or-size-after-purchase?ref=shop_home_active_3&frs=1

⬥ WHAT'S INCLUDED: 
This listing is for one shirt only. Purchase them separately to make a set :) Adjust quantity or repeat "HOW TO ORDER" steps to add multiples.

⬥ ORDER COMMUNICATION: 
Check your Etsy messages FREQUENTLY after ordering until order is received. We may have questions or have received missing/incorrect info with order. NEVER email us, always use Etsy messaging.

⬥ CUSTOM REQUESTS:
We are NOT currently accepting custom orders other than our customizable listings (names, dates) marked "CUSTOM" in the title. If you have a design idea you would like to see in our store, please message us. We may already be in process of adding it!
 
Do not leave design change requests in notes with order unless approved by us. If so, it will not be accepted & the original design will still be sent. We accommodate when we can, but some designs we do not edit or cannot be due to time constraints. 

⬥ COLOR/DESIGN INFO: 
Please be mindful when choosing your shirt/text color combinations. Some combos are harder to read. We respect customer preferences and realize some like text more subtle. We do not offer exchanges/returns based on unfavorable color combinations.
 
NOT READABLE: White text on white or heather white, black text & dark grey text on black shades, dark grey text on dark grey or deep heather etc.

HARD TO READ: Black text on dark grey heather, rose gold on heather mauve etc.

SOMEWHAT HARD: White text on athletic heather or ice blue, dark grey text on some medium color shades.
 
We respect customer choice of color selection and process all color combos as selected. The exception is any combos from the "NOT READABLE" category above. We will attempt to contact you, but If no response on Etsy within 24-48 hours, we reserve right to change text colors to a readable text/shirt combo.

⬥ 3XL / 4XL / 5XL, KIDS:
Final sale on all 3XL/4XL/5XL, kids, and sweatshirts. These are special ordered items, no stock. Please allow and extra 1-3 business days for processing. Some colors may be out of stock by suppliers. To check color availability before ordering, contact us!
If your color is not available, we will contact you for another selection.

⬥ COLOR VARIATIONS: 
We try our best for accurately depict colors, but actual colors may vary from your screen display settings. Also, shirts may appear different in color/brightness (especially heathers) under various lighting conditions (studio, indoor, outdoor, etc.). We do not offer returns/exchanges for this.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
**IMPORTANT** SIZING & FIT: 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ GENERAL SIZING INFO:
Find your style below to see the general sizing info & recommendations.

Unisex sizes inches (cm):
••• Unisex XS: half chest 161/2″ (42 cm), full length 27″ (69 cm)
••• Unisex S: half chest 19 1⁄2″ (50 cm), full length 27″ (69 cm)
••• Unisex M: half chest 21″ (53 cm), full length 28 1⁄2″ (72 cm)
••• Unisex L: half chest 22″ (56 cm), full length 29″ (74 cm)
••• Unisex XL: half chest 23″ (58 cm), full length 30″ (76 cm) 
••• Unisex XXL: half chest 24 1⁄2″ (62 cm), full length 30 1⁄4″ (78 cm)
••• Unisex 3XL: half chest 28″ (71 cm), full length 33 (83 cm)
••• Unisex 4XL: half chest 30/(76), full length 34 (86 cm)

Kid's sizes inches (cm) 
••• 02A (Age 2): half chest 12″ (31 cm), full length 16″ (41 cm)
••• 04A (Age 4): half chest 13 1⁄2″ (34 cm), full length 17 1⁄2″ (44 cm)
••• 06A (Age 6): half chest 14 1⁄2″ (37 cm), full length 18 1⁄2″ (47 cm)
••• 08A (Age 8): half chest 15 1⁄2″ (40 cm), full length 19 1⁄2″ (50 cm)
••• 10A (Age 10): half chest 17″ (43 cm), full length 21 1⁄2″ (54 cm)
••• 12A (Age 12): half chest 18″ (46 cm), full length 23″ (58 cm)

Note: Any sizing info is general suggestions & NOT a substitute for measuring! Since body types & preferences can vary significantly, we DO NOT guarantee fit. ALWAYS MEASURE -- then compare size chart with your own shirt for best results! 

⬥ SIZING VARIATIONS:
Variations in measurements up to 0.5" are acceptable within manufacturer's guidelines.

⬥ STYLES:
 Unisex Tee / Unisex V-Neck

⬥ SIZING INFO:
••• Our Unisex tee is longer and looser than women's sizing & semi-fitted for men but works great for both.
••• For ladies: consider same size for relaxed, loose, knotted fit or size down for fitted look 
••• For men: same size for a more fitted look or size up for relaxed fit.
••• Most women say they run a little big, but opinions differ, and body types/preferences vary! Measure for best results.

⬥ MATERIAL:
(ALL PRE-SHRUNK)
••• Heather colors: 52% cotton / 48% poly -- Super-soft blend!
••• Athletic & Black Heather: 90 cotton /10 poly
••• White & other solids: 100% ring-spun cotton
••• 4.2 oz., lightweight & soft
••• Lighter colors may need layered

⬥ PRODUCT NOTES:
All shirts are made using high quality materials and pressed with a commercial-grade heat press for durability.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
SHIPPING
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ PROCESSING TIMES:
Your order will be ready to ship within 1-3 business days after payment clears on Etsy. 
(additional processing time required for special orders, 3XL-4XL,5XL and custom designs)

⬥ HOLIDAY SEASON: 
Longer times during holidays may apply.
Check shop Announcement for any cut-off date or processing time changes.
If ordered past cut-off deadline, we will still send via your shipping method even if it will not arrive before holiday.

⬥ SHIPPING TIMES:
All items are shipped via USPS, estimates are below: 
 
First Class Mail: 2-5 days
Priority Mail: 1-3 days
Priority Mail Express: 1-2 days
 
NOTE: Processing times are in addition to shipping times!!

⬥ WRONG ADDRESS:
Contact us immediately on Etsy if wrong address is entered. We will try to correct it but cannot guarantee since order may have shipped. We are not responsible if delivered to a wrong address entered by customer.

⬥ RUSH YOUR ORDER:
If you have a NEED BY DATE, please leave note with exact date.
We will try to accommodate the request & expedite the processing only. This does NOT expedite shipping times unless YOU upgrade. It is your responsibility to upgrade shipping in the event you need it by certain date!

To guarantee expedited processing (especially during busy holidays), purchase the "Rush your Order" listing: 

https://www.etsy.com/listing/938446709/rush-my-order-expedite-processing-time?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

⬥ FREE SHIPPING to PRIORITY UPGRADE MAIL or EXPRESS UPGRADE MAIL

FREE SHIPPING promotions are for domestic, standard First Class mail only!
ALL free shipping on $35+ orders weighing under 16oz are sent First Class Mail, even if Etsy displays it as Priority Mail.
Contact us to verify shipping method. If you need to upgrade free standard shipping to Priority Mail use link:

https://www.etsy.com/listing/938469677/upgrade-to-priority-mail-or-express-mail?ref=shop_home_active_2&frs=1

⬥ SHIPPING LIABILITY:
••• We cannot guarantee USPS shipping times, they are only estimates.
••• We are never responsible for lost, stolen, damaged, or mis-delivered packages
••• We are never responsible for USPS transit delays or mishaps 
(once it leaves our store, it is beyond our control)
••• Etsy provides tracking by email with expected delivery, please watch for expected packages
••• We do not offer refunds or replacement order for USPS mishaps, buyer assumes risk 

WE DO NOT guarantee a delivery date. There are USPS delays that are out of my control.

Once your package has been handed off to the carrier, we do not have any control over when you ultimately receive it. Sometimes we will ship an order and the carrier will fail to scan it right away, meaning, the tracking information makes it appear your package has not left here when it has. If your order left our facility and is still in transit to you, we are unable to make the carrier deliver the package any faster If time is of the essence for your order, we suggest using USPS Next Day express. You can upgrade your shipping at checkout. First class is free.

⬥ DAMAGED PACKAGES:
••• If package appears damaged, DO NOT open. Take to local USPS to file a claim. 
Not Received:
••• If an item was marked "delivered" but not received contact the USPS immediately & file "lost mail" claim online
(also check with local P.O. branch, neighbors, and mail carrier)
••• Check with USPS for any delivery/transit issues. We will try to assist you on our end, but are only responsible for your order until it is scanned as "received" at post office. 
••• On occasion, missing packages turn up and are redelivered later once filed as lost mail.

⬥ RETURNED ITEMS:
Any items returned to us for any reason ex. (wrong address, undeliverable, etc.), buyer must pay reshipping fee to have order resent. We will attempt to contact you with link for repurchase. Any returned items in our possession for 90 days, with failure to receive response or reshipping payment, the items will be donated, and buyer will assume loss of order. 

Return/Exchange Listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924441124/returnexchange-shipping-shipping-for-an?ref=shop_home_active_5&frs=1

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
POLICIES
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
Check "Shop Policies" tab on homepage for current policies & see FAQs for more info.

https://www.etsy.com/shop/ArdensApparel?ref=simple-shop-header-name&listing_id=924441124

⬥ CANCELLATIONS:
To cancel an order, you MUST contact us via ETSY (not email) immediately - within 1 HOUR of purchase.
No exceptions! We ship out fast...most likely we have already started on it.

⬥ RETURNS/REFUNDS:
We do not offer refunds or returns for any reason. 
Please verify all order details and read all "item details/description" section before ordering!
 
⬥ EXCHANGES:
 WHAT CAN BE EXCHANGED:
••• Eligible short sleeve crew & V-neck shirt styles ONLY
••• Must be from our standard (non- personalized) and non-seasonal listings 
 ••• See full list of exclusions - Many items in our shop are FINAL SALE.
 
⬥ OUR POLICY ⬥
••• Customer must pay ALL shipping charges (to/from) for exchanges.
••• We do not provide a return label.
••• Customer assumes the risk of any loss in shipping return items.
 
NOTE: To keep our prices low and continue to offer so many custom style & color options, we ONLY accept exchanges for a different size in some cases. 
 
Items exchanged for different size must be in same shirt style /color/ writing combo and design. Please read below for exclusions and conditions.
 
⬥ EXCLUSIONS (NOT ELIGIBLE):
••• Final sale/Closeout
••• 3XL & 4XL & 5XL sizes - due to special ordering
••• All Kids, infant bodysuits
••• All tank tops, long sleeve, & sweatshirts (these are seasonal)
••• Any listings with CUSTOM word, date, year, name to be entered
••• Changes to existing design requested by customer
••• Holiday theme or seasonal designs, season listed (ex. FALL vibes, 2020)
••• Special ordered items
••• Items with text added
••• Any hard to read color combinations (see list in "color/design info" heading above)
••• Unfavorable colors/ color variances from your screen
••• Wrong color selections/ entry errors
••• Any misspelled words by customer in entry box (we print exactly as you enter)
 
⬥ EXCHANGE TIMES:
Contact us: within 3 DAYS of USPS delivery date.
Item Returned to us: within 7 DAYS of USPS delivery date.

⬥ NO EXCEPTIONS: After these dates we can no longer accept exchanges as the items may have been worn, washed, etc.
 
⬥ EXCHANGE STEPS:
••• It is buyer's responsibility to contact us within 3 days to initiate exchange process & pay ALL exchange shipping fees (to/from)
••• Item must be approved for exchange then shipped back by customer to our address within 7 days of receipt.
••• To exchange for item of higher dollar value (ex. From XL to XXL) the difference must be paid.
••• The Re-shipment fee must be paid to cover shipping cost of the replacement item. Link below.
••• It is up to customer to request tracking on exchange packages and to notify us before shipping. We are not responsible for lost/ mis-delivered items that do not reach us.
••• Returned Item must be like-new. See FAQ below under "EXCHANGE - CONDITIONS"
••• We have the right to refuse exchange if exchange conditions are not met.
 
⬥ EXCHANGE SHIPPING FEE:
This covers the cost to ship the correct size shirt to you. It must be paid before item is sent. We will send a link via Etsy to purchase once we have received your approved return (or use link below). It must be paid before item is sent and within 5 business days of receiving the return item. Failure to pay or respond within 30 days, we reserve the right to cancel exchange & donate the returned shirt. 

Reshipment listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924441124/returnexchange-shipping-shipping-for-an?ref=shop_home_active_5&frs=1

⬥ RETURN ITEM CONDITION:
Al items MUST BE in new condition…unworn, unwashed, undamaged, unused, & kept free of pet hair, stains, rips, smoke, &, & another odor, etc. Please make sure the item is in perfect condition before sending back for an exchange! 
SEE FAQ's for return item condition.
 
⬥ UNRETURNABLE CONDITION:
Any returned items not meeting the return conditions will be denied. A reshipping link will be sent via Etsy for you to pay to have the unapproved item sent back. Failure to do so within 7 days will result in loss of item which will be donated.
 
⬥ UNAUTHORIZED RETURNS:
Only send items to be exchanged if you have first contacted us and received authorization. Any exchange packages received (that have not been approved by us) -- the package will not be opened or processed. A reshipping link will be sent via Etsy for customer to pay to have package returned to them. Failure to do so within 7 days will result in loss of item which will be donated.
 
See our FAQ's below for our DETAILED return/exchange policy BEFORE ordering.
 
⬥ REPLACEMENTS/ ERRORS:
In the event we make an error, we will kindly work with you to get it resolved. 
 
REPLACEMENT CLAIM STEPS:
1.  Please contact us within 3 business days via Etsy (not email)
2.  Send a VERY CLEAR pic of the error & description via ETSY convo
3.  We will determine if it is an error on our part and send a replacement ASAP if so
 
EXCEPTIONS:
Any items that have large stains/spills/rips or tears (from opening package) or any other obvious damage that would NOT have been overlooked when packaging will be denied. No exceptions. We are human but also diligently look over every item before shipping.
We are not responsible for damage to item caused by customer after receipt.
 
PRESS MARKS/WRINKLES:
Any press marks/creases (from heat press) or wrinkles from package handling will be removed upon laundering your item. Please follow appropriate care instructions. This is not a reason for return or exchange.
 
DAMAGED PACKAGES:
If a package appears damaged upon receipt, do not open. Take to local USPS and file claim.
 
ERROR REFUNDS:
We do not offer refunds on any errors (even if need-by-date has passed) but will gladly send out a replacement. 
Please order in enough advance to account for any errors/unforeseen events.
 
⬥ CONTACT US:
If you do have a problem with your order, PLEASE contact us via ETSY so we can resolve any issues. Customer service is our top priority! We want you to LOVE your clothing and shopping experience!
 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
CARE INSTUCTIONS
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
**ROSE GOLD font & other metallic are COLD wash only, gentle cycle, inside out**

All others:
Machine Wash Gentle Cycle (Warm or Cold) or Hand Wash with mild detergent
Hang Dry (preferred) or Tumble dry Low
DO NOT Bleach or Iron on Design
 
See DETAILED CARE INSTRUCTIONS in our FAQ section for proper care of your garment!! 
We are not responsible for damage to garments due to improper care.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
CONNECT

results.title: Live Love Laugh Unity Spirit Angel Bracelet European Style Charm Bracelet Stainless Steel Bracelet with Silver plated charms ALL SIZES
results.description:
♥♥♥SHIPPING♥♥♥You will receive a tracking number USPS at the time your shipping label is printed. Please use this tracking number to watch for the date that your package will arrive at it's destination, AND I will know when you receive it. Due to COVID-19 restrictions, some items may be delayed in being delivered to you. I will try to keep you informed of these delays.

Express your soul with this beautiful stainless steel european snake chain bracelet. Beautiful as a gift to adorn your favorite person's arm. 

 If you purchase the barrel snap closure, it will come with a safety chain and a locking bead to keep the beads in place when you place the bracelet on your wrist or take it off. 

PACKAGING: This bracelet will come wrapped in anti-tarnish tissue paper, placed in a silk brocade gift pouch and then put into bracelet box. Already to give as a gift!

SHIPPING: You will receive a USPS tracking number at the time your shipping label is printed. Please use this tracking number to watch for the date that your package will arrive at it's destination, AND I, also, will know when you receive it.

SIZING: Shown on a 7.0 to 8.0 inch stainless steel snake chain bracelet with small lobster clasp closure. Make sure when measuring your wrist you add at least 1/2 - 1 inch to your wrist measurement for comfort.

******PLEASE NOTE: If you purchase a different size, the bracelet style will be different! This is the only size in the stainless steel size and style*****

Bracelet Shown not the right size? Adjustable bracelets include a one-inch chain extension.

If the bracelet that is shown doesn’t seem to be the right size let me change it out for you. Please know that converting to a smaller bracelet size may not accommodate all the beads but they will be shipped to you as part of your purchase.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS:

WEAR: You can avoid tarnish by wearing your jewelry often. The oils in your skin will “clean” the silver and keep it looking shiny.

Avoid exposure: Contact with household chemicals, perspiration, rubber, chlorinated water, or any substances which contain sulfur (e.g., mayonnaise, eggs, mustard, onions, latex, wool), will cause corrosion and tarnish — so it’s a good idea to remove silver jewelry when doing household chores. Direct sunlight also causes silver to tarnish, so be sure to take off your silver jewelry before you go swimming and sunbathing.

Lotions, cosmetics, hair spray and hair products, and perfumes are also “enemies” of silver and will accelerate tarnishing. There’s a reason generations of women have been getting dressed with jewelry last, as a finishing touch!

STORAGE: As exposure to air tarnishes it, storing silver in airtight plastic bags with anti-tarnish strips is a great preventative measure. Just make sure you don’t store multiple jewelry pieces in the same bag: gold is a soft metal, so the individual pieces can scratch each other. Link or chain bracelets should be kept unclasped or unhooked to prevent scratching as well. If you can’t use plastic bags, try to make sure that the storage area has low humidity. You can also place a piece of chalk, a packet of activated charcoal, or a container of silica gel in the storage area to minimize tarnish.

Bracelet Sizes

5.5 to 6.0 Inches (14.0-15.2cm) Small
6.0-6.5 Inches (15.2 - 16.5cm) Medium
6.5 - 7.0 Inches (16.5 - 17.8cm) Large
7.0 to 7.5 Inches (17.8 - 19.0cm) X-Large
7.5-8.0 inches (19.0 - 20.3cm) 2X-Large
8.0 - 8.5 Inches (20.3 - 21.6) 3X-Large
8.5 - 9.0 Inches (21.6 -22.9) 4X-Large
9.0 - 9.5 Inches (22.9-24.1) 5X-Large

BRACELET Styles and Colors:

Gold Adjustable bracelet Lobster Closure
Gold Torpedo and Barrel Closure
Silver Adjustable Bracelet Lobster Closure
Silver Torpedo and Barrel Closure

results.title: Modern Newly Wed Gift - Live Laugh Love - Wedding Gift - Custom Names - Wedding Couple - Classic Couple
results.description:
Modern Newly Wed Gift - Live Laugh Love - Wedding Gift - Custom Names - Wedding Couple - Classic Couple


• 3 diameters available (7", 11" and 18")
• 3/4” thick solid oak 
• Laser engraved design
• Made to order
• Low-level sheen
• Craft: stain, lacquer, paint, woodworking
• Black spade shape clock hands
• Quartz silent clock movement is flush mounted on back
• Includes hour and minute hands
• Operates on a single AA battery (not included)
• Keyhole slot on back for hanging on wall
• Props in product images (eg table easel) are not included and are for demonstration only


PERSONALIZED VS CUSTOMIZED
Personalized - is text-only edits to the original design template. So swapping out existing text - while rest of the design remains as shown in product image. This is free.
Customized - adding additional lines of text, border changes, font changes, adding a logo, or any other graphical changes that deviate from the design shown in product image. This is an additional fee (see below for more info on custom orders).


PROOFING 
Digital proof is available by request. You must request proof within 24 hours of purchase. We do not provide a proof if you have not yet placed an order. If you need a proof this may delay the above mentioned time. Incomplete information may delay processing time.  If we need to clarify something in your information this may delay the above mentioned time. The time counting begins when we have everything needed to produce your order.   

If you need to make a change after you have submitted an order and we have not started your order, you will need to cancel your existing order and submit a new order with the desired changes. So please check all of your info before submitting your order.  It is VERY IMPORTANT to double check names/dates that you submit to us.  Please ensure proper spelling and grammar - customer's are responsible for any errors submitted with order.  We cannot accept returns or refunds on engraved items, unless we made an error.

You are given 2 business days to respond to the proof before we move forward with your order in an effort to ship by Etsy's expected ship date.  
  

HOW TO ORDER:
Please provide your personalization details in the "Notes" section upon checkout: 
• Couple's names: In the same order as they should be engraved.
• Dates: In the same order as it should be engraved. Please note that the date will be in the same format as in the product picture.  
If you wish for them to be case sensitive please state this in your notes otherwise we will use the same case structure in the image of this product. 

**IMPORTANT: Beside simple personalization, if you include additional customizations: such as additional lines of text or any other customization that goes beyond simply swapping text that already exists in the product display image - you will delay your order. This would include changing the order of things (date moved from top to bottom, last name removed, etc.) In these cases, we will need to reach out to you for clarification, most likely will require you to purchase a custom fee, and then finally create a proof for your approval. If you have a custom request please see next paragraph.


HOW DO I CUSTOMIZE BEYOND WHAT IS SHOWN IN THE PRODUCT LISTING IMAGE?
If you are looking to add a logo or graphic, add additional lines of text, change border, or change fonts - then you will need to purchase our $20 custom fee. This would include changing the order of things (date moved from top to bottom, last name removed, etc.). This will also require a proofing step as well. So we would send you a proof image for you to approve (typically the following day after order is place).  
HOW TO PLACE CUSTOM ORDER: You would first pick the listing that most closely matches your vision and add that to your cart. Next, you would add the custom fee to your cart.
Add this to cart ----> https://www.etsy.com/StoryCabin/listing/499175783/custom-upcharge



To see other "Wedding & Anniversary" designs in my shop, click this link:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/StoryCabin/search?search_query=Anniversary


**GET $5 OFF FIRST ORDER!!**
---> Use on your first order when you sign up for our email newsletter. Get coupon code here ----> http://eepurl.com/b8sBsD


**NEED IT IN A HURRY?
If you want to get your order at the front of the line than purchase our Rush Fee option as well.
https://www.etsy.com/listing/520626164/rush-fee


**NEED MESSAGE ENGRAVED ON BACK?
Short text message engraved on the back in a 3 x 3 inch area.  Text message must be under 15 total words.
https://www.etsy.com/StoryCabin/listing/591595997/engraved-back





***CHRISTMAS CUT-OFF DATE***
Due to high volume of sales each December, we have a specific "cut-off date" for orders to arrive by Dec 24 for Christmas. That date cut-off date is subject to change every year.  So check our shop banner in December to see the current cut-off date.  See link below for shop home page.

Our Christmas shipping guarantee covers you in the event your package doesn’t arrive by Dec 24 if you placed your order on or before the cutoff date. We will issue a refund of your shipping fee if you placed your order by cut-off date and it didn't arrived by Dec 24 for any reason.

We may also limit our offerings during December to items that are not personalized.  We typically build our inventory in months leading up to Christmas and so to focus on fulfilling those orders we may limit our custom “made to order” products.


-------------------- ★ ★ ★ ----------------------
Thank you for visiting Story Cabin
https://www.etsy.com/shop/StoryCabin

results.title: Rusty Pickle Commitment Rubber Cling Vinyl Stamp, Acrylic Block, Words & Phrases - RARE
results.description:
Rare and hard to find.  Rusty Pickle phrase and words, cling mounted rubber stamp "Commitment" set.

Set includes all the words and phrases shown. The rubber is mounted on grey cling foam and can be used with the included acrylic block. 

Words and phrases can be cut apart and used individually, or used whole as a background stamp.  

Includes the phrases and words:  

Live, Laugh, Love - Journey of the Heart - Best Friend - Cherish - Adore - Marriage - Bliss - Inspire - Family - Party - Vows - Kiss - Love - Dream - Thanks - Proposal

Words / Letters are approximately 1/4" high (6 mm).  All are in capital letters.

The entire rubber with all words and phrases measures approximately 6 3/4" x 1  1/2" (17 cm x 3.5 cm).

The acrylic block measures approximately 7 1/2" x 2 1/2" (19 cm x 6.5 cm).

Rusty Pickle is now out of business and I have a few sets of these cling mount stamp sets from stock I had in storage from my previous retail store.  I believe these sets were made in the early 2000s.

All sets are new and in original packaging.  Packaging may show some slight wear, as they have been in storage for about 15 years. Storage was clean, dry and temperature controlled.

```````````````````````````````````````````````````

FREE SHIPPING to Canada and USA
Expected delivery is 4 - 10 business days (excluding holidays and weekends).  
Free Shipping is by First Class Lettermail (Canada Post) and 
DOES NOT INCLUDE A TRACKING NUMBER. 
I am not responsible for missing or delayed items in the postal system. 
 
Shipping International may take a little longer. 

If you require a tracking number, Tracked Package is available to Canada and the USA, see the shipping options during checkout. 

Shipped in a bubble mailer for added protection.

I combine shipping to save you delivery costs, where possible.

results.title: Sweary Embroidery Pattern - Digital Download - Instant Download - Floral Embroidery - Quote Embroidery Pattern - Live Laugh Embroidery
results.description:

The pattern also includes a DMC colour guide to recreate the hoop as pictured. Please feel free to use any color combinations you want! This pattern can be altered to fit any size hoop you like, so don't feel limited to stick with only what I have suggested.

Upon purchase you will receive 2 digital files to download;
1.  Fully traceable pattern & DMC colour guide
2. Guide to embroidery which includes           
     a) instructions on how to transfer a pattern           
     b) stitch tips           
     c) information on how to finish your hoop           
     d) supply guide

This listing is for a digital download. Upon purchasing, you will be able to download the PDF file with the pattern. Supplies are NOT included. Please ensure your email is correct and understand that this item is non-refundable after purchase.
